title: LSU football travels to Mississippi State for SEC opener
content:
STARKVILLE, MS (WAFB) - 

LSU face Mississippi State in Starkville for the Tigers' SEC opener. This will be the first full game LSU has played so far in 2015 after the season opener against McNeese got canceled due to weather on Sept. 4. 

If viewing this story on a mobile device or in an email, click the link for additional features -
